author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Add full 2021 Tracker scenario and its test configuration
* Add more debugging output
* When registering a Volume, check if its name already contains namespace

@vargasa - FYI

#### PR validation:

```
cmsRun DetectorDescription/DDCMS/test/python/testTracker2021Geometry.py
```
#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Before submitting your pull requests, make sure you followed this checklist:
- verify that the PR is really intended for the chosen branch
- verify that changes follow [CMS Naming, Coding, And Style Rules](http://cms-sw.github.io/cms_coding_rules.html)
- verify that the PR passes the basic test procedure suggested in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: DD4hep: Add 2021 Tracker Scenario
